name: player prop historical hit rate and edge, with where
description: Test case for player prop historical hit rate and edge, with where
expected_query: with "t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5_markets" as (select "source_id", "source_market_id", "time_type" from "prop_markets_index" where "market_type" = 'GAME_PASSING_YARDS' and "time_type" = 'CLOSE' and "prop_markets_index"."year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "source_id" = 'FANDUEL'), "t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5" as (select pms.selection_pid, pms.selection_metric_line, pms.current_season_hit_rate_hard, pms.current_season_edge_hard from "t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5_markets" as "m" inner join "prop_market_selections_index" as "pms" on "pms"."source_id" = "m"."source_id" and "pms"."source_market_id" = "m"."source_market_id" and "pms"."time_type" = "m"."time_type" where "pms"."selection_type" in ('OVER') and pms.current_season_edge_hard >= '0') select "player"."pid", t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5.current_season_hit_rate_hard as prop_historical_hit_rate_0, t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5.current_season_edge_hard as prop_historical_edge_0, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5" on "t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5"."selection_pid" = "player"."pid" group by t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5.current_season_hit_rate_hard, t3fe2567c0620672040bc9a62d3357bb5.current_season_edge_hard, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 2 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
